metadata.feature_description: Search wiki articles and display filtered lists with pagination

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki Test page and enter edit mode
steps.expected: Wiki module visible with article list
steps.actual: Wiki module displayed with 5 existing articles

steps.action: Use Wiki Search module to search for 'technology'
steps.expected: Search results showing articles containing 'technology' keyword
steps.actual: Search redirected to global Search Results page showing 'No results found' - search index not updated for newly created articles

issues: Wiki Search module uses site-wide search index which was not updated, causing newly created articles to not appear in search results. This is an infrastructure/indexing issue, not a code bug.

steps.action: Click on 'technology' tag in article list
steps.expected: List filtered to show only articles with 'technology' tag
steps.actual: URL updated to include tags=technology, list filtered to show 1 Article - 'Test Article for Search' which has the technology tag

steps.action: Remove tag filter by clicking X on tag chip
steps.actual: Tag filter removed, all 6 articles displayed with pagination

steps.expected: List filtered to show only articles created by current user
steps.actual: URL changed to category=myarticles, My Articles tab selected and highlighted, 6 articles displayed (all created by host user)

steps.action: Check for Draft Only filter option in desktop view
steps.expected: Draft Only filter available for moderators
steps.actual: Draft Only filter is only available in mobile view (confirmed via code review of ListContainer.ascx lines 181-184). Desktop view only shows All Articles and My Articles tabs. This is by design.

steps.action: View article list showing pagination (6 articles, 5 per page)
steps.expected: Pagination controls visible showing Page 1 of 2
steps.actual: Pagination displayed showing '6 Articles' with 'Page 1 of 2' and page navigation links

steps.expected: Navigate to page 2 showing remaining articles
steps.actual: URL updated to page=1, Page 2 of 2 displayed with 'Test Article for Tagging' (the 6th article alphabetically when sorted by title)

URL updated to sort=title, articles displayed in alphabetical order: Test Article Draft, Test Article for Bookmarks, Test Article for Metadata, Test Article for Revision Management, Test Article for Search

steps.action: Click on tag 'test@tag#1' containing special characters @ and #
steps.expected: Tag filter applied correctly with URL encoding
steps.actual: URL updated to tags=test%40tag%231 (properly URL-encoded), filter chip shows 'test@tag#1', 1 Article found - 'Test Article for Tagging'

steps.action: Type non-existent tag 'nonexistenttag123' in filter box and press Enter
steps.actual: Filter applied showing tag chip 'nonexistenttag123', '0 Articles' count displayed, message 'No articles were found' shown

observations: The 'Draft Only' filter for moderators is only available in mobile view, not in the desktop view. This is by design as confirmed in ListContainer.ascx lines 181-184 which wraps the draftonly option inside 'ko if: isMobileView' and requires CanModerate permission.

The Wiki Search module uses site-wide DNN search functionality which requires search indexing to be run. Newly created articles may not appear in keyword search results until the search index is updated by the scheduled task.
Tag filtering works via client-side Knockout.js data binding, providing immediate filtering without page reload.
Sort options available: Sort by last active, Sort by created, Sort by title, Sort by views - all working correctly.
Pagination is handled client-side with configurable page size, showing page navigation and article count.
